mapper.select: select id, email, password, username, register_status from account where id = #{id}
select id, email, password, username, register_status from account where username = #{username}
select id, email, password, username, register_status from account where email = #{email} and register_status = ${@red.semipro.domain.enums.RegisterStatus@REGULAR.value}
select count(*) > 0 from account where id != #{id} and (email = #{email} or username = #{username}) and register_status = ${@red.semipro.domain.enums.RegisterStatus@REGULAR.value}
mapper.insert: insert into account ( email, password, username, register_status ) values ( #{email}, #{password}, #{username}, #{registerStatus.value} )
update account set register_status = ${@red.semipro.domain.enums.RegisterStatus@REGULAR.value}, updated_at = current_timestamp where id = #{id}
